{{Wireless embedded system |brand=AboCom |model=WAP257 |revision= |upc= |ean= |asin= |price= |est_release_date= |fcc_date=08/08/2006 |manuf_country=Taiwan |manuf= |manuf_model= |manuf_rev= |availability= |type=access point |fcc_id=MQ4WAP257 |ic_id= |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=0.8 |pwr_conn=barrel |pwr_barrel_inner= |pwr_barrel_outer= |pwr_barrel_len= |pwr_vac= |pwr_pol= |pwr_poe= |cpu1_brand=Realtek |cpu1_model=RTL8186 |cpu1_cspeed= |cpu2_brand= |cpu2_model= |cpu2_cspeed= |fla1=2 |fla1_brand=Macronix |fla1_model=MX29LV160CBTC-90G |fla1_num= |fla2= |fla2_brand= |fla2_model= |fla2_num= |ram1=16 |ram1_brand=EtronTech |ram1_model=EM639165TS-7G |ram1_num= |ram2= |ram2_brand= |ram2_model= |ram2_num= |expansion_if_types= |expansion_pcmcia_num= |expansion_expresscard_num= |expansion_minipci_num= |expansion_minipcie_num= |expansion_usb_num= |jtag= |serial= |wi1_module= |wi1_module_if= |wi1_chip1_brand=Realtek |wi1_chip1_model=RTL8186 |wi1_chip2_brand=Realtek |wi1_chip2_model=RTL8225 |wi1_chip3_brand= |wi1_chip3_model= |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bg |wi1_ant_conn=RP-SMA |wi1_txchains= |wi1_rxchains= |wi1_sstreams= |wi2_module= |wi2_module_if= |wi2_chip1_brand= |wi2_chip1_model= |wi2_chip2_brand= |wi2_chip2_model= |wi2_chip3_brand= |wi2_chip3_model= |wi2_802dot11_protocols= |wi2_ant_conn= |wi2_txchains= |wi2_rxchains= |wi2_sstreams= |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip1_brand= |eth_chip1_model= |eth_chip2_brand=Realtek |eth_chip2_model=RTL8201CP |eth_chip3_brand=Realtek |eth_chip3_model=RTL8201CP |sw_cpu= |sw_brand= |sw_model= |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=2 |wan_ports= |flags= |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=bg |default_ssid=802.11g-AP |default_ssid_regex=^802.11g-AP$ |default_ip=192.168.1.254 |default_user=admin |default_pass= |oui=00:12:0E |oui_eth=00:12:0E |default_ch= }} [http://www.abocom.com.tw/download_show.aspx?ptype=66395a7ea68b3cb8a3e548690eb0df8a&id=14E6D87280C72AEDA2C3B37B1D071825 Downloads]
Per the manual, the default SSID is '''802.11g-AP'''.
"M01-AP257-X30" is silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos.
